modName: Dayeon the shield master - custom voiced follower
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sfp24qm.jpg[/img]


[youtube]gPgzkK5l0BE[/youtube]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/1f8zv44.png[/img]
  This mod adds a female follower in Whiterun Bannered mare. Her name is Da-Yeon.
  She is not good attacker, but excellent in defense.

  There are three versions of this mod. One is custom voiced version and the other one is Custom voiced version with vanilla outfit
   and another one is light version.

  1. Custom voiced version with custom outfit
    - She speaks dialogue in Korean voice.
    - Marriage is not supported
    - Custom mash up outfit
    - Requires HDT High heels

  2. Custom voiced version with vanilla outfit
    - She speaks dialogue in Korean voice.
    - Marriage is not supported
    - HDT High heels are not required

  3. Light version
    - She speaks dialogue in vanilla voice(FemaleEvenToned)
    - Marriage is supported
    - Vanilla outfit(Bar keeper cloth)

  * PS. I'm not good at english.
          So some subtitles of the dialogues might be weird.
          If you find it, please tell me how can i fit it.



[img]http://i.imgur.com/Rf53vPS.png[/img]
  1. Custom Voiced version with custom outfit
    - HDT Highheels ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/[/url])



[img]http://i.imgur.com/wuwH7vO.png[/img]
  1. Face light ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/[/url])
      or Rail light
  2. XPMS or XPMSE ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/[/url])


[img]http://i.imgur.com/1gCGajm.png[/img]
  1. Custom voiced version
    - Use MO or NMM to install main file.
    - If you want korean subtitle, overwrite Korean esp file.(only for custom voiced ver)
    - Install optional face files if you want.

  2. Light version or Custom voiced version with vanilla outfit
    - Use MO or NMM to install main file.
    - Install optional face files if you want.



[img]http://i.imgur.com/EtJcZMI.png[/img]
[list]
[*]Name : Da-Yeon
[*]Race : Nord
[*]Body : UNPB
[*]Sex : female
[*]Location : Whiterun Bannered Mare
[/list]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/sKhvaPn.png[/img]
  1. No compatibility issues were found with AFT / FLP.
  2. Other mods are not tested.



[img]http://i.imgur.com/F1H4DTE.png[/img]
